code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers

td.content: s:patient presents with severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet and severe strange behavior x 11 days. pt is a 68 yr old white M. o:Height 64 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

s:pt says he is having symptoms of severe strange behavior 2-3 times a week, in spite of treatment. he is a m aged 68 Ys. Denies ever using tobacco he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 63 in, Weight 167 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg at bedtime.

content2.Unmatched: pt says he is having symptoms

td.content: s:70 yr old male retired presents with severe strange behavior. he has history of severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet. he denies smoking he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 64 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

content2.Unmatched: he reports having no more than one drink a day

td.content: s:M aged 70 Ys describes severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet and severe strange behavior. o:Height 64 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg at bedtime.
